bibl.title: A New Funerary Stela in the Collection of the National Museum in Warsaw.
bibl.note: Inv. No. 237185. Low relief on a limestone slab, representing a bearded male lying on a couch and holding a kantharos, and a younger male standing and offering on an altar. Below the relief is an inscription in Greek. Egypt, second half of the 2nd or first half of the 3rd century A.D.
ZELAZOWSKI Jerzy and Alfred TWARDECKI, A New Funerary Stela in the Collection of the National Museum in Warsaw.
